details: Account Maturity gives a simple overview of some features and functionalities of your New Relic account to highlight where you may have missed a key feature, forgotten to enable a setting or config and generally ensure across our platform that you're making the most of the connected aspects
whatsNew:
- New: Brand New Release -
 Feature: Understand Your Account Feature Function usage 
 Feature: Drill down to see which apps are impacting or missing key features 
 8 Product Focus for Platform view
